channel.title: Lectures & Homework on MTH 121
channel.description: Recent content in Lectures & Homework on MTH 121

item.title: Weeks 1-4
item.description: Tuesday, August 27 Recitation: Join me today at 1-1:50pm ETfor our first live online recitation as we discuss the course, look over the syllabus, and answer any questions that you may have. Use the link on the recitation page of the Course Handbook to join the meeting. In addition to the sections listed above, you should also read section 0.2 from the textbook. There is no distinct lecture for this section as topics have been incorporated into the other lectures.

item.title: Weeks 5-8
item.description: Tuesday, September 24 We have recitation scheduled for today at 1-1:50pm ET Thursday, September 26 Exam 1 is scheduled for today at 8:45pm-10:15pm ET (it is a 1.5 hour exam). A summary of your instructor-approved exam locations is posted on UBlearns under “Your Grades and Exam Arrangements”. Tuesday, October 1 We have recitation scheduled for today at 1-1:50pm ET Comment: There is no lecture for section 2.

item.title: Weeks 9-12
item.description: Tuesday, October 22 Recitation We have recitation scheduled for today at 1-1:50pm ET Lectures Below are the three lectures assigned for this week. Thursday, October 24 Exam 2 is scheduled for today at 8:45pm-10:15pm ET (it is a 1.5 hour exam). A summary of your instructor-approved exam locations is posted on UBlearns under “Your Grades and Exam Arrangements”.

item.title: Weeks 13-16
item.description: Tuesday, November 19 Recitation We have recitation scheduled for today at 1-1:50pm ET Lectures Below are the two lectures assigned for this week, all due on December 3rd. Thursday, November 21 Exam 3 is scheduled for today at 8:45pm-10:15pm ET (it is a 1.5 hour exam). A summary of your instructor-approved exam locations is posted on UBlearns under “Your Grades and Exam Arrangements”.
